853774317.activityDescription: Travel to Phobos and investigate the Cabal distress signal.

skulls.description: Enemies appear in greater numbers and are more aggressive.

1045828271.activityDescription:
"No mercy. No hesitation. It'll take nothing less to defeat the Darkness." —Lord Shaxx 

All-out team warfare. Destroy the enemy.

skulls.description: Heavily shielded and highly aggressive enemies appear in great numbers.
Arc Damage from any source is greatly increased.
Solar damage from any source is greatly increased.
Void damage from any source is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness won't flinch, even after massive damage.
Guardian melee damage is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness deal much more melee damage.
Special Weapon damage is favored.
Primary Weapon damage is favored.
No ammo drops for your equipped weapon.
Players take more damage while airborne.
Enemies fire more frequently and more accurately.
Player radar is disabled.
Some enemy squads have been fortified with additional reinforcements.
More enemies have shields.
Enemy shields are resistant to all unmatched Elemental Damage.
Players deal more damage while in the air.
Grenade recharge rate is greatly increased.
Guardian shields are increased but do not replenish.
Recharge of abilities is significantly reduced.

2326253031.activityDescription: Skolas and his crew challenge the Guardians who captured him. Face him with a Fireteam of three. End him.

2989915775.activityDescription: An ancient Mind, feared by the Vex themselves, hides among the channels of the Black Garden. Find this machine and end its existence.

skulls.description: Enemies appear in greater numbers and are more aggressive.
Arc Damage from any source is greatly increased.
Solar damage from any source is greatly increased.
Void damage from any source is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness won't flinch, even after massive damage.
Guardian melee damage is greatly increased.
Minions of the Darkness deal much more melee damage.
Primary Weapon damage is favored.
Special Weapon damage is favored.
No ammo drops for your equipped weapon.
Players take more damage while airborne.
Enemies fire more frequently and more accurately.
Player radar is disabled.
Some enemy squads have been fortified with additional reinforcements.
More enemies have shields.
Enemy shields are resistant to all unmatched Elemental Damage.

3508129769.activityDescription: Gulrot, Unclean has been summoned by the Worm Keepers. Don't let the beast's filth spread beyond the prison.

4079642014.activityDescription: Valus Trau'ug seeks to prove his might by crushing all who challenge him.

2512542997.destinationDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

2777041980.destinationDescription: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

3393905939.destinationDescription: Dare to strike a bargain with the ruthless Queen.

3705523133.destinationDescription: Phobos was forever changed by the Cabal invasion.

4072959335.destinationDescription: In the sandswept carcass of a lost city, dark forces gather for war.

3114284952.placeDescription: The larger of Mars's two moons.

3747705955.placeDescription: Mankind's cradle, full of shattered glory, ready to be reclaimed.

4088006058.placeDescription: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

575572995.activityTypeDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

1686739444.activityTypeDescription: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.

2889152536.activityTypeDescription: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.

3614615911.activityTypeDescription: Face your fellow Guardians in open combat. Prove your worth, and you will be rewarded.

133098253.itemDescription: Häkke prototype. Make precision shots with this weapon to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

219031984.itemDescription: As a Fireteam of 2 or more players, defeat 5 opposing Guardians without anyone in your Fireteam dying.
219031984.displaySource: "The best defense is absolute offense." —Lord Shaxx

536304807.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Make precision shots to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

677734480.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

718379268.itemDescription: Omolon prototype. Use in the Crucible to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

777856833.itemDescription: Revive 5 teammates in the Trials of Osiris.

1209869505.displaySource: "Nothing creepier than Vex eyes peering at you from the dark." —Cayde-6

1209869507.displaySource: "Our battle with the Hive may never end. But we can make them regret starting the fight." —Eris Morn

1249604201.itemDescription: Defeat an opposing Guardian using Disintegrate.
1249604201.displaySource: "Defenders train to personify both sword and shield at once." —Commander Zavala

1364640840.itemDescription: Defeat 7 Guardians in the Clash playlist.

1364828729.itemDescription: Earn 75 points in Trials by round wins (+3), losses (+1), and ties (+1). As a Trials Fireteam, defeat 3 opposing Guardians without anyone in your Fireteam dying.
1364828729.displaySource: "After much toil and blood, your arm will be strong and your aim true. Then you will understand the value of your victories." — Brother Vance

1602394684.displaySource: "Fallen shields are particularly susceptible to Arc damage. Certain Harpy models, as well." —Ikora Rey

1641320861.itemDescription: Take down the Guardian who last defeated you.
1641320861.displaySource: "Everyone dies, Guardian. What matters is what you do after that." —Lord Shaxx

1652727536.displaySource: "I mean, there are always exceptions, but Void Light shreds Vex shields." —Cayde-6

1652727542.itemDescription: Get 3 kills within 3 seconds 7 times using a Special Weapon.
1652727542.displaySource: "Be alert. Be ready. Your weapon always is." —Banshee-44

1849105108.itemDescription: Your victory in the Trials has earned you the right to Gold Tier prizes.

1904384474.itemDescription: You've proven yourself worthy. Bring this to Variks in the Reef to redeem for a piece of armor.

2167576374.itemDescription: Complete 5 Trials of Osiris matches or win 1 Trials match.
2167576374.displaySource: "The strongest Guardians are the ones who fight through adversity." —Brother Vance

2254123540.itemDescription: Shavings from flower-shaped crystals with pharmaceutical and chemical applications.

2400432043.itemDescription: Complete 10 Trials matches. As a Trials Fireteam, defeat 75 opposing Guardians.
2400432043.displaySource: "Only the worthy can complete the Trials. But even among the worthy, there are those who stand above the rest." —Brother Vance

2601444957.itemDescription: Häkke prototype. Use against Cabal to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

2759745988.itemDescription:
Defeat enemies in the Prison of Elders to gain notoriety with the House of Judgment.

Raise your standing to unlock better rewards.

2990972208.itemDescription: Your power grows. Bring this to Variks in the Reef to redeem for a weapon.

3053827345.itemDescription: Your achievements in the Trials earn you the right to Bronze Tier prizes.

3109888176.itemDescription: A volatile synthesis of energized matter and self-modifying energy constructs.
3109888176.displaySource: Obtained from Nightfall Strikes, the Prison of Elders and awarded for renowned performance in the Trials of Osiris.

3340894601.itemDescription: Win 2 consecutive rounds in the Trials of Osiris.
3340894601.displaySource: "Hone your Light to strike again and again, until all opponents are defeated." —Brother Vance

3392485744.displaySource: "What you'll get out of the Crucible will come from what you put into it." —Lord Shaxx

3468224294.itemDescription: Your achievements in the Trials earn you the right to Silver Tier prizes.

3646422942.itemDescription: In Clash, defeat 2 opposing Guardians in a single life.
3646422942.displaySource: "Survive. Sometimes, when you just survive, everything works out fine." —Cayde-6

4085991205.itemDescription: Collect resource nodes, open chests and kill enemies on Venus.
4085991205.displaySource: "Despite our best efforts, Venus remains a battleground between the Fallen and the Vex over Golden Age secrets. Plan your hardware accordingly." —Roni 55-30

4246987600.itemDescription: Defeat 3 opposing Guardians while near at least one of your teammates.
4246987600.displaySource: "The line is everything. Break theirs, maintain yours." —Brother Vance

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2197472680.bucketDescription: Additional missions for Guardians to carry out in the wilderness.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

3865314626.bucketDescription: Useful for equipment upgrades and more.

155624089.statDescription: Decreases weapon recoil when fired continuously.

368428387.statDescription: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

943549884.statDescription: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

1240592695.statDescription: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

1345609583.statDescription: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

1931675084.statDescription: How much space the weapon occupies in the inventory.

2391494160.statDescription: Light increases your level, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

2715839340.statDescription: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

2961396640.statDescription: Rate at which the weapon charges.

3871231066.statDescription: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

4043523819.statDescription: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

4188031367.statDescription: Decreases the time it takes to reload this weapon.

4284893193.statDescription: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

77746637.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.

192233393.displayDescription: Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.

318657130.displayDescription: This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.

597127202.displayDescription: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.

824061322.displayDescription: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

972070082.displayDescription: This weapon gains a boost to range and handling when health is low.

1026458383.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.

1258704074.displayDescription: Chance to refill this weapon's magazine when critically wounded.

1568304667.displayDescription: One random bullet in the magazine causes considerable bonus damage.

1632665602.displayDescription: When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.

1863078623.displayDescription: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

1900693659.displayDescription: Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.

2421244048.displayDescription: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.

2450150110.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.

2626112550.displayDescription: It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.

2725595956.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.

3052118152.displayDescription: Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.

3102938162.displayDescription: This weapon gains improved range and handling for a short time after revival.

3119194123.displayDescription: The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.

3133914358.displayDescription: This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.

3245550306.displayDescription: This weapon can be fired in full auto mode.

3283108368.displayDescription: Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.

3464328064.displayDescription: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

3523239750.displayDescription: This weapon handles and reloads faster when the wielder is the last living player of their Fireteam.

3661306029.displayDescription: This weapon's magazine will be refilled whenever you unleash your Super.

3722223157.displayDescription: This weapon becomes more accurate as your health gets lower.

3848963378.displayDescription: Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.

3877389831.displayDescription: Reduces the severity of this weapon’s recoil.

3911170550.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.

4023922623.displayDescription: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

4198986151.displayDescription: Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.

summary.vendorDescription: There are few weapons that Banshee-44 has not seen, and fewer still that he cannot fix.

You fought bravely on the Moon.
Choose a weapon. You've earned it.
